net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.video

Class VideoQuality

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.video.VideoQuality

  • public class VideoQuality
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents the quality of a video stream. It contains the resolution, the framerate (in fps) and the bitrate (in bps) of the stream.

    • Field Summary

      • VideoQuality

            int resY,
            int framerate,
            int bitrate)
        Represents a quality for a video stream.
        Parameters:
        resX - The horizontal resolution
        resY - The vertical resolution
        framerate - The framerate in frame per seconds
        bitrate - The bitrate in bit per seconds
